wordsmith
Class Wordsmith

java.lang.Object
  wordsmith.Wordsmith

public class Wordsmith
extends java.lang.Object

Wordsmith is a lib for doing topic modeling and text analysis based off of mallet

Author:
doug fritz, aaron zinman
+Example
import wordsmith.*;

Wordsmith wordsmith = new Wordsmith(this);
